attributes.action: Stop aggressive US imperialism and remember the world is more important than the USA!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re:  Is Bush the New Hitler and are the USA the Fourth Reich?

With George Bush again flexing is imperialist muscle by first invading Afghanistan, then Iraq.  Then threatening everyone from North Korea, Russia and now Iran, I personally feel the threat to world peace comes more from the USA than any Arab/Islamic fundamentalist.  Just as Hitler used fear of the Jews to instill hatred so Bush is with regard the Arabs and Islamic world?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
